title: Chromecast with Google TV is still a great Chromecast dongle that does what it says on the box
content:
The Chromecast with Google TV has remained the best Chromecast dongle on the market, offering 4K HDR streaming support, a voice remote with a dedicated Google Assistant button, new personalized recommendations, and the ability to control connected smart home devices. It has an updated design over its predecessor and packs a quad-core Amlogic S905D3G chip,

The post Chromecast with Google TV is still a great Chromecast dongle that does what it says on the box appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Chromecast with Google TV is still a great Chromecast dongle, even if it's not the best streaming stick you can get. Read about it here.
